website_summaries.verdict: Highly praised for its comfort, but its soft sole may also affect the shoe's durability and its grip on wet turf.
pros: Great look, with a choice of colors
Sole is softer than other models, adding to this shoe's comfort
cons: Plan on buying up a half-size, as this shoe runs a little small
Soft sole may affect durability, as well as traction on rainy/wet turf

customer_reviews.title: ... 2nd pair of F1 Impact Golf shoes and I love them. I embrace the exercise aspect of golf ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of F1 Impact Golf shoes and I love them. I embrace the exercise aspect of golf so I walk and carry my clubs 18 holes and not wearing a good comfortable pair of shoes will simply wear your feet out on some of the courses I play. These shoes are like walking on a cushion of air and my feet are thankful for the comfort they provide. I'm thinking about buying a third pair to have on hand for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Victor C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but a step down from prior models
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable or “sneaker-like” as previous versions, but still comfortable. Not very breathable. I swapped insoles as the stock ones are pretty flat. Provide great support during golf swing and allows one to easily finish on the forward outside heel. Have walked 36 holes in a 3 day period (I alternate shoes between rounds to allow them to dry out) without any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rath

customer_reviews.title: Last shoe you'll need.
customer_reviews.text: First of all my favorite thing is the color. They are a very comfortable shoe, with all other golf shoes I've used I've had to have time to break them in which is hard to do when you only play for a couple hours each week, in my case. These were broke in from the first time I wore them. I was a little nervous about the amount of grip they would provide but they work great, obviously not as well as metal spikes, but still provide good grip.
customer_reviews.author: keltonflinders

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Slippery when wet!
customer_reviews.text: Finished 3rd round of golf walking with these lightweight Nikes today. I find them comfortable, supportive, water resistant and true to size. The only minor complaint is that after raining all day yesterday the grass was wet today, and these spikeless shoes, like others I suppose, slip a bit when unwinding a long drive off the teebox. I will use my old soft-spike shoes next time the course is wet. Otherwise I'm quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits just like current Nike running shoes. I'm normally a 10.5 in most shoes, but I found that I'm a full size larger in a Nike. This particular golf shoe is great because its cleatless outsole allows you to wear it anywhere without damaging floors or being obvious as a golf shoe. Now I don't have to change shoes if I drop by the range during daily errands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. They are water resistant and fit great like a tennis shoe. Very light weight and comfortable. I love mine. They give plenty of traction for the average golfer. I golf maybe 10 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very comfortable and provide good grip on the golf course
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable and provide good grip on the golf course, and since they don't have spikes, they are suitable for everyday atheletic shoes. No need to change into golf shoes at the course, just put them on before you leave for the course. They are easy to drive in. Buy them 1/2 size larger than your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fassett

customer_reviews.title: Favorite golf shoes I have had.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size bigger after reading reviews. I have wore them for 2 rounds now (both dry conditions) and I didnt have any issues with slipping or sliding. I like the meshed design as well. My feet were much cooler than playing in my previous shoes. I was expecting them to be a little more light gray than they are but they still look good.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: You'll forget you're wearing golf shoes if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.text: The tread is a bit light, however the comfort factor more than compensates, especially in dry weather. You'll forget you're wearing golf shoes if you're not careful. Nike won me back with the F1 series.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Tyme

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are lightweight and fit great. Very comfortable to wear through a round of golf. Also the traction is great considering it is not the screw type. They have lasted me awhile now, and still look and feel good. Would definitely recommend to friends to buy the same thing. I should have bought another pair while I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: RK2

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable and will go with anything. Good traction from the soles, they don't "pick up" grass and leaves, and they are kind to the greens too. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Good golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Never tried mom spoke golf shoes must say I like these a lot and believe they help with weight shift
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He really likes them. He told me they were one of the most comfortable golf shoe he has worn! The colors are great too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit fine!
customer_reviews.text: A little tight but after jamming a few pair of socks in them overnight, fit fine!
customer_reviews.author: Motown Boyz

customer_reviews.title: ... shows for the first time and they are very comfortable. They are fairly lightweight and the are waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Wore these shows for the first time and they are very comfortable. They are fairly lightweight and the are waterproof. Would recommend them. I take a 9-1/2 shoe and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Quality’s
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of use in New York golf season which is a few months the rubber soles started to come apart.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, shoe strings could be a little longer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, shoe strings could be a little longer, also could of been a different color, or came with another pair of shoe strings different color , neon.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Limas

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size on these great shoes
customer_reviews.text: In my experience, Nikes run a little small and I have wider feet, so I normally wear a 10 and bought an 11 W. The shoes fit great! They grip nice and do well on wet grass - socks stay dry. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ScottH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This is my 2nd pair (just in case it rains!).
customer_reviews.author: Fernando J. Victorica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent golf shoe especially for walking. Light and cool just great for our Florida course.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh D. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Solid golf shoe for the price. Lugs on the bottom could be a little longer. Feel some slippage on wet grass, not as stable as conventional golf spikes.
customer_reviews.author: George R Jares

customer_reviews.title: Best $45 I have spent
customer_reviews.text: Best $45 I have spent! I've worn these golfing 3 times now and have no complaints. Went to the store where they were $140 and tried them on and then ordered off of amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brent K.

customer_reviews.title: Would have a little more padding above the sole as ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have a little more padding above the sole as you feel the cleats coming up into the sole of your feet.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes with shallow tread. I love wearing them at driving range.
customer_reviews.text: The best looking golf shoes I have found. They are very comfortable. The tread is pretty shallow, so I only use these for practice at the range.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic golf shoes! Haven't worn them in wet conditions yet, but perfect golf shoes so far. Super light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Henry Silver

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SHOE. EVEN BOUGHT A SECOND PAIR. COMFORTABLE, SIMPLE, LOOKS GOOD WITH PANTS OR SHORTS.
customer_reviews.author: richard m

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the other reviews! I wear an 11 so ordered 11.5! Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes I like the design on the sole it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoes I like the design on the sole it leaves very little marks on the greens, excellent shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A Good Comfortable Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of Nike marketing, but this is a nice product. Very comfortable right out of the box. Have not slipped once, even on wet grass.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: What someone hopes for, in shoes, on a golf course..
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to wear/clean, and light..Size was what I expected..You'll be satisfied with these shoes..
customer_reviews.author: patsblast

customer_reviews.title: they are really a good value.
customer_reviews.text: For me the shoes are not designed for walking the 18 holes. If you play mostly using a golf car, they are really a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but slipped a bit
customer_reviews.text: Wore them today for the first time. Sunny day, 45 degrees to start, mid 60's at the end. While very comfortable, I slipped a half dozen times. There was dew on the grass, and all the slippage happened on the tee boxes. Even on the 18th hole, when it was basically dry... Maybe in the middle of summer when bone dry, but I live and play in the Seattle area, so that's s limited window. Returned them today and will look for a running shoe style with soft spikes.
customer_reviews.author: The Original Thirsty Camel

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn for a round
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn for a round. Makes for an easy 18. Haven't tested in real wet conditions, but are perfectly fine for clear-to-morning moisture weather
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but run a a little on the small ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but run a a little on the small side. That is the only reason I gave them a 4 star instead of a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best normal condition golf shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe ever worn for normal conditions. Did experience rear foot slippage during wet conditions just twice. Great shoe feels like wearing a stability running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort are great. Performance was bad
customer_reviews.text: Fit and comfort are great. Performance was bad. Not good grip. If you swing hard, or have lower body movement you are in trouble. If you are old and swing slower than and sloth than these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gehret

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes with great support
customer_reviews.text: When ordering Nike....order 1/2 size larger. Great shoes with great support.
customer_reviews.author: Neveda Resident

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very very comfortable, wish they were not only golf shoes
customer_reviews.author: JHM

customer_reviews.title: He loved them and they fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my son! He loved them and they fit true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Kelee

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of "expensive" golf shoes......
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 pairs on line based on my experience with the first set purchased about 1 year ago. Very comfortable and a new pair has better grip and stability vs a worn out pair played for 100 rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Moffett Golfer

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable. I will never buy golf shoes with the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. I will never buy golf shoes with the spikes again. Plus, they look pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: JBSAL

customer_reviews.title: Comfort...
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe for the once a week golfer. Durable and they breath very well. Keep their grip very nicely on the tee box
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Sized like a Nike Free shoe. Good grip and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable shoes. Great grip.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome golf shoes. Surprisingly good grip for a spikeless shoe. Comfortable as sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very comfortable. Good cost benefit relationship. It looks like regular sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and very comfortable shoe with very good traction.
customer_reviews.author: A. Muttillo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run a little small. Had to return & pay shipping fee.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ann Capuzzi

customer_reviews.title: Golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little small for an 11M. However, I think they will be ok. Very comfortable otherwise. Maybe I'll try an 11.5M the next time. My feet may still be growing in my old age.
customer_reviews.author: gerald clark

customer_reviews.title: Casual and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes, they are extremely comfortable. When purchading them I was worried about their grip as I tend to swing way to hard. I am more than happy with how they grip the earth and they are water resistant to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I find them to be a bit roomy but not enough to go down a half a size. Otherwise good stability and ground feel.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bobryk

customer_reviews.title: The issue I have is that these shoes were shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: The issue I have is that these shoes were shipped to me in a random brown box, as opposed to a nike box. So I have no idea whether these are real nikes or whether I can return these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi Gupta

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect size for me
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect size for me. And i really like the design of it. Pretty sure I can't get this from local sports authority.
customer_reviews.author: Chans Park

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these...comfy and practical. Not worrying about spikes falling out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my grandson for a gift. He loves them. Delivered quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J Connell

customer_reviews.title: Ordering on line is a little bit of a crap shoot. The shoes are not comfortable - I ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordering on line is a little bit of a crap shoot. The shoes are not comfortable - I am hoping I can break them in to where they will not pinch. Each brand has variations within the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: tot1

customer_reviews.title: Love these Vs. Spiked
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot more comfy the my first pair of spiked nikes. I typically wear an 11 and these seem to be just barely right with a thin sock. Should have bought 11.5. Great shoe overall though.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best shoe. Walk 18 three times a week great support no slipping and not tired.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great spike-less golf shoes with just enough support but comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Federoff

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best golf shoes I have ever owned. The molded sole is perfect for walking on and off the course.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Marks

customer_reviews.title: Nike does a good job in this style of golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nike does a good job in this style of golf shoe; they are ultra comfortable. And then Amazon does a great job of making sure you get what you ordered. Hats off to both.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Went for only one round and it felt very good. The quality seems very good as expected from ...
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to review. Went for only one round and it felt very good. The quality seems very good as expected from Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Sreeraj

customer_reviews.title: New shoe
customer_reviews.text: So far very comfortable need a little more time to say for sure and I like the colors and design.
customer_reviews.author: Dannny Riley

customer_reviews.title: ... white ones (or gray) regular size but my husband liked the black instead although they were a wider fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white ones (or gray) regular size but my husband liked the black instead although they were a wider fit (he usually only gets regular width) I didn't tell him they were different but I had him try on both and he said the Black wider width was so comfortable!! And they were half the price too :) So far he is very happy with these golf shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Lorcor

customer_reviews.title: That advice was perfect as the 9
customer_reviews.text: I wear and size 9 shoe, but ordered 9.5 based on reviews. That advice was perfect as the 9.5 fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LLR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a little larger than usuall and the color is not grey. It's a off white

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Nike FI Impact golf shoes fit perfect!!! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Schulze

customer_reviews.title: ... a Nike fan but this golf shoe is the best of the bunch i bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought diff brand and I am not even a Nike fan but this golf shoe is the best of the bunch i bought!
customer_reviews.author: J-nursing student

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and look great on the course. A different look than the usual golf shoes you see out there while maintaining great grip on the turf
customer_reviews.author: Cray B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoe, a little smaller than expected. Would go a half size bigger next time
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: They look good and feel good, occasional loss of traction during swing but great 95% of the time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Fit well, stay dry and clean. Very comfortable. Forgot I was wearing golf shoes:)

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size larger and a wide and still too small
customer_reviews.author: Bill Heberer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe! Can be tight around the toes but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe! Can be tight around the toes but I have wide feet! I would get these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and fast shipping. Quality shoe and it's much more comfortable than the tiger woods Nike shoes.
customer_reviews.author: thsato91

customer_reviews.title: but I like them. We'll see how they hold up
customer_reviews.text: Only have worn them once, but I like them. We'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend for anybody.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Looks good, feels good, and super light. I would recommend this to any golfer out there that's looking into a new golf show.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lines

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish. Have played 2 rounds in them and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable ....feels like wearing a running shoe...good grip with the sole pattern
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of problems with shoes. I have orthotics and a narrow heel both of which make fitting difficult. I like to walk 18 so comfort is as important as stability on the tee. I've only worn these a few times but so far the are the best I've found for my particular circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! I played whistling straits with them right ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I played whistling straits with them right out of the box and my feet never hurt once!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Super Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Nike Shoes on and off the golf course. These werer no disappointment....they are great.... excellent fit and look. good traction on wet grass. recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: ecb

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe. I have a wide foot so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I have a wide foot so I got the wide size which fits perfectly. This is my third type of this shoe. Ideal for dryer conditions as the sole is spikeless. I have slipped in very wet grass. Terrific summer golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: GRW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable Pair of Nike footwear I have ever owned

customer_reviews.title: Have great grip and stability and they are my most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are fitted perfectly. Have great grip and stability and they are my most comfortable shoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller, arrived on time, great lite & comfortable golf shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved the golf shoes. Great fit and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl maddox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking shoe, and found it for a great deal. Shipped quickly as well.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, colors look amazing and it feels fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe Good value
customer_reviews.text: These Nike shoes fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I would recommend them highly. A good value for the money!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe with good grip. Great feel and looks just like an athletic shoe, just as comfortable too. Super comfortable and virtually no "break in" period, unlike traditional golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Nike free shoes so I gave these a try. They did not disappoint. I am going to throw out my other golf shoes and only wear Nike and Trues from now on.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love them, great product. What more can I say to take up 16 more words? this is stupid to put an amount on how many words you need.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pairs but different color though. The most comfortable golf shoes I have, Really! I can run with it on the course and wont event hurt my feet after. Highly recommend if you like to walk the course.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Makaratad

product_meta.title: NIKE Golf Men's NIKE FI Impact (W) Golf Shoe, Light Base Grey/Light Base Grey//Black, 9 2E US
product_meta.description: Nike Golf is passionately dedicated to ushering in the future of this great sport by developing groundbreaking innovations that enable athletes to perform at their physical and mental peak. We believe that your footwear is the foundation of every shot and have developed many styles to deliver comfort while promoting better balance, weight transfer and power through impact. Nike Golf footwear offers an ergonomic design that supports ideal natural motion and flexibility, and golf specific lug patterns for penetrating traction, lateral support and walking comfort.
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh uppoer with strategic tpu overlay
Free-inspired outsole with flex grooves and rubber traction pods
